title: How Context Shapes Thought
shortDescription: A short conversation about how our surroundings affect decision making.
longDescription: In this extended episode we speak with Dr. A about context-dependent reasoning, experiments, and implications for daily life. We discuss methodology and key findings, and end with listener questions.

title: Trends, Fashion, and Identity
shortDescription: Why do trends feel so compelling? A look at fashion, status, and identity.
longDescription: A deep dive into how trends relate to identity formation and social signaling. Featuring interviews and personal reflections.

title: Everyday Cognitive Shortcuts
shortDescription: Explaining mental shortcuts we all use and their everyday consequences.
longDescription: We discuss heuristics, where they help, where they mislead, and how to be mindful of them in conversations and decisions.
